short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Launch websites you visit on your computer on your Android phone or tablet

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension works with Handover 3.0, available from http://handover.hamzahrmalik.com

It allows you to quickly and seamlessly open whatever website you currently have open on your computer on your note. It is also possible to do this the other way around (from phone to PC). This does not require the extension
